description.value:
The Charming Student is a silver-tongued, eye-catching, or spotlight-seeking individual. Their ability to win people over with their demeanor and well-timed words often means they lead groups of like-minded individuals, are club presidents, or maybe part of the student council.

Restriction: Must start the game with at least 12 Charisma

Student Abilities:

  • Characteristic Points: +2 to Charisma, +1 to Any Other

  • Starting Skills: Insight, Leadership, Persuasion

  • Forceful Personality: @UUID[Compendium.mka.studenttypes.JAtTrOixZkfYCIzx]{Forceful Personality} You may use Inspiration and, as a Free Action, your next Charisma Skill Check result becomes 20+Mod. You may only use this ability during a Non-Combat Encounter and it can used after dice are rolled.
